title: Traces Of Me
description: Charlotte Bellamy's life changed forever the night she witnessed her parent's brutal murders. She lost everything that day, her parents, her home, her friends, her school, her clothes and even her hair. She hated her monster and one day she vowed to kill him. She wasn't the criminal, she was the victim, yet she's been held prisoner ever since.Her whole life as she knows it is all about being able to disappear without a trace. No attachments, no friends, no lovers, no home, only brief moments with Agent Jay, her protector and only friend.Jay Carter has always been able to keep his work separate from his personal life, until Charlotte Bellamy. From the moment her deeply saddened, lonely eyes met his he made her his first priority but it isn't until Charlotte wraps her hand around his that he begins to doubt his professional distance.Four years later, both of them struggling with desires that continue to simmer, the game of cat and mouse with the killer is coming to an end. There can be only one survivor.Jay is determined to keep her safe but Charlotte is slipping from his control. He may not be there when she needs him the most.*Mature Content** Recommended for ages 17+ due to sexual situations
author: Nicole T. Smith
